
North West Trains would like to apologise for the cancellation of the 16:39 to Manchester Victoria. This is due to snow on the line.

  - And I get it, I do, it's just...
  - I love snow. I've loved it ever since I was a little kid.
  - Seeing it makes me happy, even if I'm going to be stuck at the station for ages because of it.
  - Is that bad? Am I selfish for enjoying something that is so bad for everyone else?
  - Maybe I'm overthinking it a bit. I should go outside and enjoy it while it lasts.
}

END undefined
North West Trains would like to welcome you all aboard this delayed service to Manchester Victoria, and hope that you haven't been too inconvenienced by the inclement weather.

VAR a
42
